message:
Goodbye 2016! Get that New Years party started with Smart Products from the Xperia Store.

http://bit.ly/FB-NewYear-FreshStart

Your signature pose. Our signature front camera technology. That’s what we’d call a perfect match.

http://bit.ly/FBFrontFacing
Our devices, backed by years of innovation comes from good genes.

Not happy with your presents? Don't be sad! Visit the Xperia Store and treat yourself with Smart Products for a head start in the New Year.  

http://bit.ly/FB-NewYear-FreshStart

Classic design, timeless charm. Download our retro PlayStation theme for your Xperia: http://bit.ly/FB-PSTheme

Stay tuned for more old-school themes coming soon – there are five to collect in total.
The elegant shape of Xperia X Compact is equalled only in its sophisticated Mist Blue colourway. Explore more, here: http://bit.ly/FB-XperiaXCompactDesign

Switching smartphones? Make it simple with Xperia Transfer. All the stuff you love, safely swapped over to your new Xperia. 
http://bit.ly/FBXperiaTransfer

Last chance to win! Count the mince pies on Xperia Lounge and you could bag one of ten Xperia XZ smartphones up for grabs: 

http://bit.ly/XL-FBMincepies
Hands up, who unwrapped their very own Xperia this morning? #HappyHolidays
Say cheese. Capture smiling selfies in main camera-like quality with the impressive front-facing camera in Xperia XZ.
Got the holidays all wrapped up with Xperia? There’s only one more sleep to go!
13MP. True-to-life colours. Sharp details. When the perfect selfie moment strikes, think Xperia XZ. http://bit.ly/FBFrontFacing

With incredible low light performance and naturally vibrant colours, #Xperia XZ will make your food look even better than it tastes.

See what we mean – feast your eyes on our favourite #WowofNow food shots.
Pop in over the holidays, and enjoy fresh competitions, playlists, themes and more on Xperia Lounge: http://bit.ly/XL-FBStocking
For a camera speed that’s quick off the mark, the power inside needs to be just as impressive. Thankfully Xperia XZ is driven by Qualcomm Snapdragon 820.http://bit.ly/FB-Xperia-Performance

Food Photography Tips with Sony Xperia XZ

We’re creating tasty treats in the kitchen TODAY at 1100GMT with David Griffen Photography and showing you the perfect way to capture colours, movement, and even low-light shots. Don’t miss our LIVE tutorial!

Love snapping tasty things you’re about to eat?  Tune in to our next LIVE photography tutorial where David Griffen Photography will show you how to capture impressive colours and movement, even in low light.

Catch it on Thursday 8th December at 1100GMT – don’t miss it!
